cards.name: Melisandre
cards.text: Shadow (5). Stealth. Each participating character without shadow gets -1 STR. Challenges Action: Choose a character with STR 1 or lower and place it in shadows. (Limit once per phase.)

cards.name: No Crown but Truth
cards.text: Interrupt: When the effects of an opponent's triggered character ability would initiate, kill a Maester character to cancel those effects and draw 1 card.
cards.flavor: "A clever fool and a foolish wise man. A crown to match your chain, Lord Maester." <cite>Melisandre</cite>

cards.name: Shipborn Bastard
cards.text:
X is the number of cards you control with initiative modifiers. 
+1 Initiative.

cards.name: Lonely Light
cards.text:
While Lonely Light is standing, increase the cost for each player to bring cards out of shadows by 1.
+1 Reserve.

cards.name: Alchemist Apprentice
cards.text: Dominance Action: Kneel Alchemist Apprentice to choose a non-limited location with printed cost 2 or lower and return it to its owner's hand. (Limit once per phase.)
cards.flavor: The pyromancer looked indecently pleased with that prospect.

cards.name: All the Gold in Casterly Rock
cards.text: Limited. Shadow (0). Reaction: After you win an [intrigue] challenge, gain 2 gold for each card you control in shadows.
cards.flavor: "The gold I grant you, but the Rock is mine." <cite>Tyrion Lannister</cite>

cards.name: Ser Manfrey Martell
cards.text:
Renown.
While Ser Manfrey Martell is participating in a challenge, insight and renown resolve for the losing player instead of the winning player.

cards.name: Hidden in Shadow
cards.text: Character you control only. Shadow (0). Action: Sacrifice Hidden in Shadow to place attached character in shadows. Reaction: After Hidden in Shadow is discarded from shadows, draw 1 card.
cards.designer: Card design by 2018 Joust World Champion, Lennart Paga.

cards.name: Wick Whittlestick
cards.text: Shadow (3). Reaction: After Wick Whittlestick comes out of shadows during a challenge in which you control a participating character, each player must choose a participating character they control, if able, and discard it from play.

cards.name: Seventy-Nine Sentinels
cards.text: Challenges Action: During a challenge in which you control a defending [thenightswatch] character, kneel any number of [thenightswatch] characters with 1 or fewer challenge icons to have them participate in the challenge on your side.
cards.flavor: "They left their posts in life, so in death their watch goes on forever" <cite>Bran Stark</cite>

cards.name: Howland Reed
cards.text:
Stealth.
Reduce the cost of the first [stark] card you bring out of shadows each round by 2.
cards.flavor: "But they will not fail. My father knew the worth of Howland Reed." <cite>Robb Stark</cite>

cards.name: "Wolves in the Hills"
cards.text: Interrupt: When claim is applied for a challenge, return an attacking Direwolf character or an attacking character with a Direwolf attachment to your hand to apply claim of another challenge type instead.

cards.name: War Elephants
cards.text: Ambush (8). Intimidate. No attachments. Reduce the cost to ambush War Elephants by 1 for each Commander character you control. War Elephants cannot be marshaled or placed during setup.

cards.name: The Stallion Who Mounts the World
cards.text: Reaction: After you win a [power] challenge as the attacking player, kneel your faction card to search your deck for a Dothraki character and put it into play. Shuffle your deck. The defending player may kill 2 characters to cancel this effect.

cards.name: Undercity Spymaster
cards.text: Shadow (3). Stealth.
cards.flavor: Men spoke of seeing him down in the undercity, in rat pits and black brothels, consorting with mummers, singers, sellswords, even beggars.

cards.name: Growing Influence
cards.text: Interrupt: When the effects of an opponent's triggered character or location ability would initiate, give that player 1 gold from your gold pool to cancel those effects.
cards.flavor: "The bride's father and brothers have bent the knee and sworn him their swords." <cite>Tywin Lannister</cite>

cards.name: Elder Brother
cards.text: While you have a The Seven plot card revealed, Elder Brother cannot be killed.
cards.flavor: "He has restored many a man to health that even the Maesters could not cure, and many a woman too." <cite>Narbert</cite>

cards.name: "Widow's Ford"
cards.text: Shadow (0). Reaction: After an attachment or location enters your discard pile, place it in shadows with a shadow token on it. While that card is in shadows, it gains shadow (X). X is its printed cost.

cards.name: The Age of Heroes
cards.text: Reaction: After the challenges phase begins, kneel your faction card to search your deck for a Legacy or Valyrian Steel attachment, reveal it, and add it to your hand (you may put it into play instead if it is a Tapestry attachment). Shuffle your deck.

cards.name: Armed to the Teeth
cards.text: Your deck cannot include non-Weapon attachments. After all agendas are announced, search your deck for up to 5 different attachments, reveal them, and place them facedown under this agenda. Reaction: After you win a challenge, kneel your faction card and pay X gold to put an attachment with printed cost X into play from under this agenda.
cards.designer: Card design by 2022 Stahleck Joust World Champion, Marti Foz Hernandez.
